metadata.title: CVE-2024-36026 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: fixes a random hang in S4 for SMU v13.0.4/11 While doingmultiple S4 stress tests, GC/RLC/PMFW get into an invalid state resultinginto hard hangs. Adding a GFX reset as workaround just before sending theMP1_UNLOAD message avoids this failure.
